title: Sax True Flow Heavy Body Acrylic Paint, 1/2 Gallon, Blockout White - 402600
description: Sax acrylics blockout paint is used for art education and activities, and is medium bodied for ease of application and providing a waterproof matte finish when dry. The blockout is intermixable with any acrylic medium for creating a range of colors, and is versatile for traditional acrylic painting as well as block printing and silk screening. The blockout has a durable plastic 1/2 gallon container for storage, and meets the Art & Creative Materials Institute, Inc. (ACMI) certification standards for quality and non-toxicity. The blockout is suitable for classroom and home use.
